abort.single_instance_allowed: Kun én konfigurasjon av Smart Irrigation er tillatt.

error.auth: Weather service API key or version incorrect
error.name: Spesifiser et unikt navn for integrasjonen.

user.title: Generell oppsett
user.description: Hvis du trenger hjelp med konfigurasjonen, kan du se https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

data.name: Unikt navn for integrasjonen
data.use_weather_service: Use a weather service (Open Weather Map or Pirate Weather) for weather data or forecasting. Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irigation will not be able to use forecasts.

step1.title: Weather service API set up
step1.description: Hvis du trenger hjelp med konfigurasjonen, kan du se https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

error.auth: Weather service API key or version incorrect
error.invalid_coordinates: Ugyldige koordinater. Sjekk breddegrad (-90 til 90) og lengdegrad (-180 til 180) verdier.

init.title: Weather service API set up
init.description: Hvis du trenger hjelp med konfigurasjonen, kan du se https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

data.use_weather_service: Use a weather service (Open Weather Map or Pirate Weather) for weather data or forecasting. Enable this option if you intent to use one of the supported weather services for at least part of the weather data, including forecasting. Disable this option if you want to use another source, such as your own weather station, exclusively. In this case, Smart Irigation will not be able to use forecasts.

step1.title: Weather service API set up
step1.description: Hvis du trenger hjelp med konfigurasjonen, kan du se https://github.com/jeroenterheerdt/HASmartIrrigation

coordinates.title: Stedskoordinater
coordinates.description: Konfigurer stedskoordinater for innhenting av værdata. Du kan bruke manuelle koordinater som er forskjellige fra din Home Assistant plassering om nødvendig.

data.manual_coordinates_enabled: Bruk manuelle koordinater i stedet for Home Assistant plassering

set_all_buckets.description: Set buckets for all zones to a specific value

reset_all_buckets.name: Reset all buckets
reset_all_buckets.description: Reset bucket for all zones to 0

clear_all_weather_data.name: Clear all weather data
clear_all_weather_data.description: Clear weather data for all zones

set_multiplier.name: Set multiplier
set_multiplier.description: Set multiplier for a zone to a specific value

set_state.name: Set the state of a zone

set_zone.name: Set the values of a zone
set_zone.description: Set all configurable values of a zone

generate_watering_calendar.name: Generate watering calendar
generate_watering_calendar.description: Generate a 12-month watering calendar for irrigation zones based on representative climate data
